languages.text: "Кассия подала интересную мысль. Пусть случится убедительное чудо, которое докажет, что Горнило — истинная святыня".
"Cassia has brought up an interesting idea. Let a convincing miracle happen that would prove that this Crucible is a true relic."
languages.original_text: "Кассия подала интересную мысль. Пусть случится убедительное чудо, которое докажет, что Горнило — истинная святыня".

languages.text: “卡西娅的观点很有趣。制造一场令人信服的奇迹吧，证明熔炉是真正的圣物。”
languages.original_text: "Cassia has brought up an interesting idea. Let a convincing miracle happen that would prove that Crucible is a true relic."

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅的观点很有趣。制造一场令人信服的奇迹吧，证明熔炉是真正的圣物。”

languages.text: «Cassia ha planteado una idea interesante. Que ocurra un milagro convincente que demuestre que el Crisol es una verdadera reliquia».
languages.original_text: "Cassia has brought up an interesting idea. Let a convincing miracle happen that would prove that Crucible is a true relic."

traits.locale_text: «Cassia ha planteado una idea interesante. Que ocurra un milagro convincente que demuestre que el Crisol es una verdadera reliquia».

languages.text: 「カシアが興味深いアイデアを持ち出したんだ。坩堝が真の聖遺物であることを証明する、説得力のある奇跡を起こそう」
languages.original_text: "Cassia has brought up an interesting idea. Let a convincing miracle happen that would prove that Crucible is a true relic."

traits.locale_text: 「カシアが興味深いアイデアを持ち出したんだ。坩堝が真の聖遺物であることを証明する、説得力のある奇跡を起こそう」

languages.text: « Cassia a eu une idée intéressante : un miracle particulièrement convaincant ne suffirait-il pas à prouver que le Creuset est une véritable relique sacrée ? »
languages.original_text: "Cassia has brought up an interesting idea. Let a convincing miracle happen that would prove that Crucible is a true relic."

traits.locale_text: « Cassia a eu une idée intéressante : un miracle particulièrement convaincant ne suffirait-il pas à prouver que le Creuset est une véritable relique sacrée ? »

languages.text: "Cassia hatte einen interessanten Einfall. Lasst ein überzeugendes Wunder geschehen, das beweist, dass der Tiegel eine echte Reliquie ist."
languages.original_text: "Cassia has brought up an interesting idea. Let a convincing miracle happen that would prove that Crucible is a true relic."

traits.locale_text: "Cassia hatte einen interessanten Einfall. Lasst ein überzeugendes Wunder geschehen, das beweist, dass der Tiegel eine echte Reliquie ist."

languages.text: "Cassia, ilginç bir fikir sundu. Pota'nın hakiki bir yadigâr olduğunu kanıtlayacak ikna edici bir mucize gerçekleştirelim."
languages.original_text: "Cassia has brought up an interesting idea. Let a convincing miracle happen that would prove that this Crucible is a true relic."
